H0.text: Who played the character Mr Chips in the 2002 TV adaptation of Goodbye Mr Chips. Martin Clunes

H1.text: Who played the character Mr Chips in the 2002 TV adaptation of Goodbye Mr Chips. Stephen Fry

H2.text: Who played the character Mr Chips in the 2002 TV adaptation of Goodbye Mr Chips. Jim Broadbent

H3.text: Who played the character Mr Chips in the 2002 TV adaptation of Goodbye Mr Chips. Lucy Aston

A4.text: In 2002, Clunes took the lead in ITV's production of Goodbye, Mr. Chips.
